VARCentroCusto #include COMSYS #include INConst
OnAfterDataFields(pidCentroCusto) new idNode,strDesc,blnHighlight,idParent
do GetNodes(pidCentroCusto) // Get the nodes to display do StartTree^COMTree(YPARA)
set idNode = "" for { set idNode = $order(^CacheTempCentroCusto(YUCI,YUSER,idNode)) quit:idNode=""
set idParent = $get(^CacheTempCentroCusto(YUCI,YUSER,idNode)) set blnHighlight = (idNode=pidCentroCusto) set strDesc = $$^WWWFORMAT("VARCentroCusto","D",1,idNode)
do AddNode^COMTree(idParent,idNode,$$GetCode^INBItemGroup(idNode),strDesc,,"VARCentroCusto",,blnHighlight,,blnHighlight,,,$$$YES) } do StopTree^COMTree($$$YES,,$$$YES) kill ^CacheTempCentroCusto(YUCI,YUSER)
quit
GetNodes(pidCentroCusto) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Return a group, its ancestors and direct children - for display. ; ByRefs: global array: ^CacheTempCentroCusto(YUCI,YUSER,idCentroCusto)=parent ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idCentroCusto,idParent,objCentroCusto,idxGroup
kill ^CacheTempCentroCusto(YUCI,YUSER)
// Get ancestors set idCentroCusto = pidCentroCusto while (idCentroCusto'="") { set objCentroCusto = $get(^VARCentroCusto(YM,idCentroCusto,1)) set idParent = $piece($get(^VARCentroCusto(YM,idCentroCusto,Y)),Y,5) set ^CacheTempCentroCusto(YUCI,YUSER,idCentroCusto) = idParent set idCentroCusto = idParent }
// Get children set idxGroup = $$$Index(pidCentroCusto) $$$Order4(^VARCentroCustos,YM,1,idxGroup,idCentroCusto) set ^CacheTempCentroCusto(YUCI,YUSER,idCentroCusto) = pidCentroCusto $$$End
quit
OnBeforeDelete(pidKey) new idxLocn, strStatus quit:(pidKey = "")
set idxLocn = $$$Index(pidKey)
set strStatus = $$$OK
if $data(^VARCentroCustos(0,1,idxLocn)) { set strStatus = "0 "_"Esse centro de custo Ã© pai de outros centros de custo. Favor excluir os filhos antes de poder deletar o pai." }
if $$$ISERR(strStatus) { set Q=$$$QDontDelete $$$DecomposeStatus(strStatus) $$$Alert(strStatus) }
quit strStatus
